title: Control
fullText:
Each socket-outlet on or in a service pillar shall be controlled by its own individual switch that is â€”
(a) mounted immediately adjacent to the socket-outlet it controls or is otherwise suitably identified as to the socket-outlet it controls; and
(b) clearly identified to indicate the off and on positions.
A socket-outlet that is switched by the insertion and withdrawal of the plug is deemed to meet the requirements of this Clause.
A combined RCD and overcurrent circuit-breaker (RCBO) complying with the requirements of AS/NZS 61009.1 may be used to satisfy this requirement.
